questions.question: Who was the ruler of Vijayanagar Empire?
questions.answer: Krishnadevaraya

questions.question: Who was Tenali Raman?
questions.answer: A poet and jester

questions.question: Why did Pundit Shahane come to Vijayanagar?
questions.answer: To challenge the scholars

questions.question: What made the courtiers nervous?
questions.answer: The scholar’s challenge

questions.question: Who suggested calling Tenali Raman?
questions.answer: First scholar

questions.question: What condition did Tenali Raman put forth?

options.text: Chief Pundit status for a day

questions.answer: Chief Pundit status for a day

questions.question: How did Tenali Raman enter the court?
questions.answer: In a palanquin

questions.question: What was the strange scripture called?
questions.answer: Tilakashta-mahisha-bandhana

questions.question: Why did Pundit Shahane concede defeat?

options.text: He had never heard of it

questions.answer: He had never heard of it

questions.question: What was inside the silk bundle?
questions.answer: Sesame sticks and rope

questions.question: How did Tenali Raman enter the court?
questions.answer: In a palanquin

questions.question: What was the strange scripture called?
questions.answer: Tilakashta-mahisha-bandhana

questions.question: Why did Pundit Shahane concede defeat?

options.text: He had never heard of it

questions.answer: He had never heard of it

questions.question: What was inside the silk bundle?
questions.answer: Sesame sticks and rope

questions.question: Why were the courtiers frightened?
questions.answer: They were afraid to face the learned Pundit Shahane.

questions.question: What punishment did the emperor threaten?
questions.answer: He threatened to expel the scholars from his court.

questions.question: Why was Tenali Raman called to the court?
questions.answer: To save the honour of Vijayanagar scholars.

questions.question: Why was Tenali Raman taken in a palanquin?
questions.answer: To honour him as the Chief Pundit for a day.

questions.question: What was Pundit Shahane’s claim?
questions.answer: He claimed mastery over all scriptures.

questions.question: Why did Shahane fail the challenge?
questions.answer: He could not understand the strange scripture name.

questions.question: What did til mean?
questions.answer: It means sesame.

questions.question: What does mahisha-bandhana refer to?
questions.answer: A rope used to tie buffaloes.

questions.question: What quality of Tenali Raman is shown?
questions.answer: His wit and intelligence.

questions.question: What is the message of the skit?
questions.answer: Intelligence and presence of mind defeat arrogance.
